Source code for app.chat_page.chat

from PySide6.QtWidgets import (
    QWidget,
)
from app.chat_page.ui.ui_chat_place import Ui_chat_bot



[docs]class chat_quest(QWidget, Ui_chat_bot):
    """The landing page for the chatbot."""

    def __init__(self):
        """Initialize the ui."""
        super().__init__()
#           Set up the ui

        self.setupUi(self)
        self.history_box.setReadOnly(True)
        self.send_button.clicked.connect(self.send_message)


[docs]    def send_message(self):
        """Send a message to the chat bot as well as the history."""
        user_input = self.user_input.toPlainText()
        if user_input:
            self.update_history("You:", user_input)
            self.user_input.clear()
            self.chat_process(user_input)



[docs]    def chat_process(self, user_input):
        """Process user input and respond."""
        chat_response = "I'm just a placeholder for now."
        self.update_history("Quest Chat:", chat_response)



[docs]    def update_history(self, user_input, chat_response):
        """Update the history to record user input and chat bot response."""
        self.history_box.append(f"{user_input} {chat_response}")
        self.history_box.append("")
